fact-1.value: Swedish Match develops, manufactures, and sells quality products with market leading brands.

fact-9.value: Swedish Match provides consumers with the best quality products with well-known brands. Some of Swedish Match’s brands include: ZYN (nicotine pouches), General (snus), Longhorn (moist snuff), Onico (pouch products with neither tobacco nor nicotine), America’s Best Chew – formerly Red Man – (chewing tobacco), Thunder (chew bags), Oliver Twist (tobacco bits), White Owl (HTL, homogenized tobacco leaf cigars), Game (natural leaf cigars), Fiat Lux (matches), and Cricket (lighters).

fact-7.value: Sveavägen 44, postal address: SE-118 85 Stockholm, Sweden
